thread.section_title: Pickupflowers.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pickupflowers.com | pickupflowers.com
thread.title: Den Dun

author: Den Dun
title: Den Dun
text:
Order No. 01710220.
Ordered flowers on 3rd Feb , payment taken on 6th Feb , delivery date 8th Feb no flowers no contact from company.
Online chat not much help. I called the overseas number at 22:00 and was told the goods I had paid for were not available. But would send other flowers on 9th Feb.
10th Feb flowers arrived , a poor replacement for what was ordered.
Wont use these people ever again !
